author: Dan Taekema
title: 'A cry for help': Staff at Hamilton retirement home refused to work amid COVID-19 outbreak
description: When the first confirmed cases of COVID-19 started appearing at The Cardinal Retirement Residence employees walked off the job, leaving behind dozens of residents and less than a handful of desperate staff members to care for them.
content:
